text: Futhi hlalani ezindlini zenu, futhi ningazivezi njengokuziveza kwezikhathi zokungazi zasendulo futhi yenzani umthandazo nikhokhe izakaah (ingxenye yemali ekhokhwa kwabampofu) futhi nihloniphe uMvelinqangi nesithunywa sakhe, kuphela uMvelinqangi uthanda ukususa izenzo ezimbi kunina Bantu bomndeni futhi anihlanze ngokuhlanzwa okuphelele
